item.title: Major European Payment Processor Can't Send Email to Google Workspace Users
item.description: Viva.com, one of Europe's largest payment processors, sends verification emails without a Message-ID header — a recommendation of RFC 5322 since 2008. Google Workspace rejects them outright. Their support team's response to my detailed bug report: your account has a verified email, so there's no problem.
item.author: (Ian Atha)

item.title: Turning YouTube Into Cloud Storage
item.description:
How I made a YouTube file media storage using C++ and a few libraries. You can view my repository here: https://github.com/PulseBeat02/yt-media-storage
Here is the Wirehair O(N) fountain codec repository: https://github.com/catid/wirehair
For those who want to learn more, I recommend taking a look into CRC flavors, Wirehair code, and video compression algorithms. I tried to give a brief explanation, but in the real-world, they are much more complex.
Animations were made using a combination of Manim and DaVinci Resolve https://github.com/3b1b/manim https://www.blackmagicdesign.com/products/davinciresolve
Video format heavily inspired by @3blue1brown
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Timeline: 0:00 - Intro 0:43 - Video Containers 1:15 - Metadata Stripping 1:48 - Video & Audio 3:35 - Naive Approach 3:56 - YouTube Compression & Transcoding 5:25 - Take a Step Back 5:41 - File Chunking 6:15 - QR Codes 7:20 - Drawing Parallels 7:54 - Why Not QR Codes 8:41 - Cyclic Redundancy Check (CRC) 12:38 - Forward Error Correction & Wirehair 14:21 - Hybrid Error-Proof Algorithm 14:42 - Storing into Video Container 15:06 - Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT) 16:21 - Hiding File Data in DCTs 17:51 - Choosing Video Codec for Encoding 18:52 - Demo Video 20:54 - Wrapping Up 21:25 - Outro
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Music: Music by Vincent Rubinetti Download the music on Bandcamp: https://vincerubinetti.bandcamp.com
Stream the music on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/2SRhEEt2tlDQWxzwfUo9Dl
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Socials: Website: https://brandonli.me/ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/MgqRKvycMC GitHub: https://github.com/PulseBeat02 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/brandonli28
------------------------------------------------------------------------
item.author: (Brandon Li)
